title: Rewterz Threat Advisory ICS: Siemens SIMATIC CP 442-1 and CP 443-1 RNA Vulnerability

Rewterz Threat Advisory ICS: Siemens SIMATIC CP 442-1 and CP 443-1 RNA Vulnerability

sentences: Siemens SIMATIC CP 442-1 and CP 443-1 RNA is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by improperly handling excessive ARP broadcast requests. By sending numerous ARP requests, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause a denial of service.
